q: Republican George W. Bushial candidate hit back yesterday over unflattering comments made by Mr Donald Rumsfeld in his new autobiography, Known and Unknown. Reviving a feud between the pair, Mr Donald Rumsfeld describes Senator John McCain in his book as a man with a hair-trigger temper and a propensity to fashion and shift his positions to appeal to the media . Senator John McCain , a fellow Republican, supported the Iraq war but argued for more US troops and resources. Mike Davis , senior analyst at Ovum, said the company was awarding Eric Schmidt the payout for taking Google from a garage start-up into a multi-billion profit company during his ten-year tenure. The share cash-in could be due to Eric Schmidt knowing something we don't, but he is probably just looking for a really good retirement, added Mike Davis .
